author: Kim G
title: First USA visit
text:
Very reluctant to visit New York but so glad I did !! The Empire is ideally situated for exploring the city , the room was comfortable if a little small but it wasn't a problem as we only used it for resting and boy we needed that !!
The bed and linen were great as was the shower , my only fault was the lack of milk sachets and coffee pods but a minor problem , very helpful staff , if we go again we will book here
